content: alessandra hayden copyright may 2015 basket weave coffee sleeve by alessandra hayden www justbehappycrochet com please do not sell this pattern or post it on the internet if you sell anything m a d e w i t h t h i s pattern please give me credit for the pattern difficulty easy gauge not crucial just make sure your chain 30 ring fits around the coffee cup if it doesn t use a larger hook supplies - worsted weight yarn- crochet hook 4 5mm - scissors - yarn needle optional 1 button + needle & thread page �  1 of �  3 coffee sleeve alessandra hayden copyright may 2015 abbreviations chain = chain double_crochet = double_crochet st s = stitch es slip_stitch = slip_stitch fpdc = front post double_crochet bpdc = back post double_crochet fo = fasten_off yo = yarn over fpdc yo insert hook from front to back to front around post of specified double_crochet yo and draw up a lp yo and draw through 2 lps twice fpdc made bpdc yo insert hook from back to front to back around post of specified double_crochet yo and draw up a lp yo and draw through 2 lps twice bpdc made size fits a standard 16oz coffee cup page �  2 of �  3 coffee sleeve alessandra hayden copyright may 2015 instructions round 1 chain 30 join with a slip_stitch to form a ring 30 round 2 chain 3 counts as double_crochet now and throughout 1 double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch on top of chain 3 30 double_crochet round 3 chain 3 fpdc in the next 2 sts *bpdc in the next 3 sts fpdc in the next 3 sts* repeat from * to * 4 times bpdc in the last 3 sts join with a slip_stitch on top of chain 3 5 sets of fpdc 5 sets of bpdc round 4 repeat round 3 round 5 chain 3 bpdc in the next 2 sts *fpdc in the next 3 sts bpdc in the next 3 sts* repeat from * to * 4 times fpdc in the last 3 sts join with a slip_stitch on top of chain 3 5 sets of fpdc 5 sets of bpdc rounds 6-7 repeat round 5 rounds 8-10 repeat round 3 fo finishing using the yarn needle weave in loose ends add a button if desired copyright 2015 alessandra hayden all rights reserved page �  3 of �  3 coffee sleeve
